description:
Siebold`s Blastoise is his main partner. It can also Mega Evolve into Mega Blastoise during battles. Mega Kamex`s Ability is Mega Launcher.
When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan`s Charizard held it own for most of the battle against until it finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan`s Charizard as it was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage.
name: Kamex (Zumi)
